name: Fall Box: Color Spin Cube Down
name_original: Fall Box: Color Spin Cube Down
description:
Slide the control box left and right to rotate the box to the slot position;
When the box falls down, it just enters the gap of the topmost box;
Eliminate the falling boxes one layer at a time, and let the troubles disappear as well.
If you have any ideas, please contact us at liliang757@sohu.com.
